__e: Mother, this may be hard for you to believe, okay, but I don't need you.

Oh, I can't believe you're really here.
I can't believe you did that for me.
- How you have not done anything?
I can't believe she didn't even call me.
I can't believe I wasn't there for you.
I can't believe you didn't tell me.
I can't believe you did that for me.
- How you have not done anything?

Well, believe it or not, that's all we are.

that is wonderful. Yeah, I can't believe it. I've never been this happy.
